Scene:
Kuzunoha's Parting with Her Son
(Kuzunoha kowakare / 葛の葉子別れ)

Play: The White Fox of Shinoda (芦屋道満大内鑑)

Production: October 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Takemoto Koshijidayū IV (竹本越路大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Dōhachi II (see also Tsuruzawa Tokutarō) (鶴沢道八 (二))

Nozawa Kizaemon II (野澤喜左衛門 (二))
